channel.title: Evony is shit
channel.description:
[img]http://cdn.ad4game.com/847be84edac25005b3fb70c31ba51f52.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.crunchgear.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/07/evony.jpg[/img] [img]http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_79cnvgZLeRs/SpB4zLzKI8I/AAAAAAAAB-M/Og9CMQJ37_U/s400/EVONY+come+play+my+lord.jpg[/img] [img]http://intgr.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2009/09/evony.png[/img]
[b][size=18pt][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yFb9QKkNDU8&feature=player_embedded]Main Proof[/url] [/size][/b] yet they/he still continues to fraud all this shit from porn sites, copied things from RuneScape and who knows what other sites he copied things from.
The video is all the proof you need.
Evony should piss off and start a real MMORPG without all the fraud and false advertising. And no I'm not a victim of falling for the advertisement banners.

item.title: Evony is shit

older than the internet

Why is it still up?
[/quote]
because it’s obviously super effective?[/quote]
this game still deserves to die!
